name: Pan-Fried Zucchini With Fresh Corn
keywords: corn on the cob, zucchini, dairy-free, gluten-free, low calorie, low cholesterol, low-fat, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Trim the ends of the zucchini and slice the vegetable thin. Cut the kernels of corn off the ears.
Heat the oil over medium-high heat in a large nonstick skillet. Place the zucchini, salt and pepper and the cumin in the skillet. Cook, tossing and stirring, for about 3 minutes.
Add the corn and the scallions. Cook and stir for 2 more minutes and blend well. Sprinkle with parsley and serve.
